text: Michelle de Paula Firmo Reinaldo Bolsonaro (born 22 March 1982) is a Brazilian socialite. She was the First Lady of Brazil from 2019 to 2022. She is the third wife of the 38th President of Brazil Jair Bolsonaro. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Brazil Category:People from Federal District (Brazil)
title: Michelle Bolsonaro
